i=e;i;){if(i==t)return!0;i=_(i)}return!1}function _(t){var e=t.parentNode;return e&&11==e.nodeType&&e.host?e.host:e&&e.assignedSlot?e.assignedSlot.parentNode:e}}();

  </script>
  <script src="https://static.seriouseats.com/1/braestar/live/js/libs/libs.head.min.js?v=20200429" type="text/javascript">
  </script>
  <script>
   window.seGlobalMethods = window.seGlobalMethods || {};
    seGlobalMethods.observeIntersection = (element, callback) => {
      const thresholdArray = steps => Array(steps + 1)
       .fill(0)
       .map((_, index) => index / steps || 0)

      const handleIntersect = entries => {
        entries.forEach(entry => {
          callback(entry);
        });
      }

      const observer = new IntersectionObserver(handleIntersect, {
        threshold: thresholdArray(20),
      });
      observer.observe(element);
    }
  </script>
  <script>

n.XDomainRequest,o.open("GET",e)),t&&(o.onload=t),o.send(),o},r=function(n){"svg"===e.method&&e.ready(function(){o(e.href,function(){var o=t.createElement("style");o.innerHTML=this.responseText;var r=e.getCSS(e.href);r&&(r.parentNode.insertBefore(o,r),r.parentNode.removeChild(r),e.embedIcons(e.getIcons(o)),"function"==typeof n&&n())})})};e.ajaxGet=o,e.svgLoadedCORSCallback=r,e.embedSVGCors=r}(grunticon,this)}();
  
  grunticon(["https://static.seriouseats.com/1/braestar/live/icons/icons.data.svg.css?v=20201123", "https://static.seriouseats.com/1/braestar/live/icons/icons.data.png.css?v=20201123", "https://static.seriouseats.com/1/braestar/live/icons/icons.fallback.css?v=20201123"]);
  </script>

   <div class="header-global__content">
    <a class="header-global__logo-container" data-click-category="nav" data-click-id="logo" href="https://www.seriouseats.com">

    <nav class="Nav--desktop" role="navigation">
     <div class="Nav__category" data-idx="0" data-link="/recipes">
      <a class="Nav__category-title" data-click-category="nav" data-click-id="recipes" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/recipes">
       <span>
        Recipes
       </span>
      </a>
      <div class="Nav__listing">
       <a class="Nav__item">
        Browse by:
       </a>
       <a class="Nav__item Nav__item--indent" data-click-category="nav" data-click-id="recipes-dish-type" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/recipes/topics/meal">
        Dish Type
       </a>
       <a class="Nav__item Nav__item--indent" data-click-category="nav" data-click-id="recipes-ingredient" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/recipes/topics/ingredient">
        Ingredient
       </a>
       <a class="Nav__item Nav__item--indent" data-click-category="nav" data-click-id="recipes-cuisine" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/recipes/topics/cuisine">
        Cuisine
       </a>

  <form action="https://www.seriouseats.com/search" class="Search-overlay" id="SearchForm" method="get" onsubmit="handleSearchFormSubmit(event)">
   <div class="Search-overlay__outer-container" onclick="stopPropagation(event)">
    <div class="Search-overlay__container" onclick="stopPropagation(event)">
     <h2 class="Search-overlay__heading">
      Search for recipes and articles
     </h2>
     <div class="Search-overlay__input-wrapper">
      <input autocomplete="off" class="Search-overlay__input" id="search-box" name="term" onkeyup="handleSearchFormInputChange(event)" placeholder="What would you like to cook?"/>
      <div class="Search-overlay__results" id="search-result-box">
      </div>
      <button class="Search-overlay__clear hidden" onclick="clearSearchBox(event)" type="button">
       <svg style="pointer-events: none;" viewbox="0 0 32 32">
        <g fill="currentColor" fill-rule="evenodd">
         <rect height="4" rx="2" transform="rotate(45 16 16)" width="32" y="14">
         </rect>
         <rect height="4" rx="2" transform="scale(-1 1) rotate(45 0 -22.627)" width="32" y="14">
         </rect>
        </g>
       </svg>
      </button>
      <button class="Search-overlay__submit" onclick="handleSearchFormSubmit(event)">
       <svg style="pointer-events: none;" viewbox="0 0 33 32">
        <g fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd" stroke="none" stroke-width="1">
         <g fill="currentColor" fill-rule="nonzero">

           <path d="M31.6572903,26.5538065 L25.7651613,20.6596129 C26.8655484,18.7148387 27.4993548,16.4707097 27.4993548,14.08 C27.4993548,6.68077419 21.4792258,0.660645161 14.08,0.660645161 C6.68077419,0.660645161 0.660645161,6.68077419 0.660645161,14.08 C0.660645161,21.4792258 6.68077419,27.4993548 14.08,27.4993548 C16.8505806,27.4993548 19.4229677,26.6570323 21.5597419,25.2139355 L27.2784516,30.9326452 C27.8812903,31.5354839 28.676129,31.8389677 29.4668387,31.8389677 C30.2616774,31.8389677 31.0523871,31.5354839 31.6572903,30.9326452 C32.8670968,29.7228387 32.8670968,27.7636129 31.6572903,26.5538065 L31.6572903,26.5538065 Z M4.78967742,14.08 C4.78967742,8.95793548 8.96,4.78967742 14.08,4.78967742 C19.204129,4.78967742 23.3703226,8.95793548 23.3703226,14.08 C23.3703226,19.2020645 19.204129,23.3703226 14.08,23.3703226 C8.96,23.3703226 4.78967742,19.2020645 4.78967742,14.08 L4.78967742,14.08 Z">

     <div class="Search-overlay__curated-suggestions">

    <div class="Search-overlay__close" onclick="closeSelf(event)">
     <svg style="pointer-events: none;" viewbox="0 0 32 32">
      <g fill="currentColor" fill-rule="evenodd">
       <rect height="4" rx="2" transform="rotate(45 16 16)" width="32" y="14">
       </rect>
       <rect height="4" rx="2" transform="scale(-1 1) rotate(45 0 -22.627)" width="32" y="14">
       </rect>
      </g>
     </svg>

  <script>
   var searchOverlayFormEl = document.getElementById('SearchForm');
    var searchOverlayInputEl = searchOverlayFormEl.querySelector('input');
    var searchOverlayClearButton = searchOverlayFormEl.querySelector('.Search-overlay__clear');
    var searchOverlaySuggestions = searchOverlayFormEl.querySelector('.Search-overlay__curated-suggestions');

    function closeSelf(e) {
      searchOverlayFormEl.classList.remove('active');
      bodyScrollLock.enableBodyScroll(searchOverlayFormEl);

      var fexy_relish_tab = document.getElementById("fexy-relish-tab");
      if (fexy_relish_tab) { fexy_relish_tab.style.display = ""; } 

      dataLayer.push({
        "event": "gaEvent",
        "category": 'search-overlay',
        "action": 'click',
        "label": 'close-overlay',
        "nonInteraction": false
      });
    };

    function clearSearchBox(e) {
      e.preventDefault();
      e.stopPropagation();
      searchOverlayInputEl.value = '';
      const event = new Event('input', {
        bubbles: true,
        cancelable: true,
      });
      const keyEvent = new Event('keyup', {
        bubbles: true,
        cancelable: true,
      });
      searchOverlayInputEl.dispatchEvent(event);
      searchOverlayInputEl.dispatchEvent(keyEvent);
    }

    function stopPropagation(e) {
      e.stopPropagation();
    };

    function handleSearchFormInputChange(e) {
      e.stopPropagation();
      if (searchOverlayInputEl.value.length) {
        searchOverlayClearButton.classList.remove('hidden')
        searchOverlaySuggestions.classList.add('hidden');
      } else {
      //add a small delay so we don't see the suggestion box overlaying this
        setTimeout(() => {
          searchOverlayClearButton.classList.add('hidden')
          searchOverlaySuggestions.classList.remove('hidden');
        }, 200)
      }
    }

    function handleSearchFormSubmit(e) {
      e.preventDefault();
      e.stopPropagation();
      if (searchOverlayInputEl.value.trim()) {
        dataLayer.push({
          "event": "gaEvent",
          "category": "search-overlay",
          "action": "search",
          "label": "manual-submit" + searchOverlayInputEl.value.trim(),
          "nonInteraction": false
        });
        searchOverlayFormEl.submit();
      }
    }
  </script>
  <script>
   function openSearch(e) {
  var searchForm = document.getElementById('SearchForm');
  searchForm.classList.add('active');

  var fexy_relish_tab = document.getElementById("fexy-relish-tab");
  if (fexy_relish_tab) { fexy_relish_tab.style.display = "none"; } 

  var searchInput = document.getElementById('search-box');
  if (window.innerWidth > 480) {
    searchInput.focus();
  }
  dataLayer.push({
    "event": "gaEvent",
    "category": 'search-overlay',
    "action": 'click',
    "label": 'open-overlay',
    "nonInteraction": false
  });
  bodyScrollLock.disableBodyScroll(searchForm);
}

function handleLeaderboardCloseXClick(e) {
  var leaderBoardElement = document.querySelector('.leaderboard');
  if (leaderBoardElement) {
    leaderBoardElement.style.display = 'none';
  }
}

function handleHeaderHamburgerClick(e) {
  seGlobalState.navIsOpen = !seGlobalState.navIsOpen;
  var navEl = document.querySelector('.Nav');
  var headerEl = document.querySelector('.header-global:not(.header-global--desktop)');

  if (seGlobalState.navIsOpen) {
    navEl.classList.add('Nav--open');
    headerEl.classList.add('header-global--menu-open');

    var fexy_relish_tab = document.getElementById("fexy-relish-tab");
    if (fexy_relish_tab) { fexy_relish_tab.style.display = "none"; } 

  } else {
    navEl.classList.remove('Nav--open');
    headerEl.classList.remove('header-global--menu-open');

    var fexy_relish_tab = document.getElementById("fexy-relish-tab");
    if (fexy_relish_tab) { fexy_relish_tab.style.display = ""; } 

  }
  document.body.style.overflow = seGlobalState.navIsOpen ? 'hidden' : null;
}

function toggleSection(e) {
  var clickedCategory = e.target.closest('.Nav__category');
  var clickedIdx = clickedCategory.getAttribute('data-idx');
  var navEl = clickedCategory.closest('.Nav');
  var categories = navEl.querySelectorAll('.Nav__category');
  categories.forEach(function(category) {
      if (clickedIdx !== category.getAttribute('data-idx')) {
        category.classList.remove('Nav__category--open');
      } else {
        clickedCategory.classList.toggle('Nav__category--open');
      }
  });
};

try{if(!!window.MSInputMethodContext&&!!document.documentMode){
  var stickyElements = $('.sticky-ie11');
  Stickyfill.add(stickyElements);
}} catch(e){console.error(e)}
  </script>
  <div class="content-main">
   <section class="block promo-triple block-has-featured block-has-author" id="featured">
    <div class="block__wrapper">
     <div class="block__wrapper-inner">
      <div class="module">
       <div class="module__wrapper">
        <a class="module__image-container module__link" data-click-category="promo-triple block-has-featured" data-click-id="featured-slot-1" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/roundups/essential-italian-pasta-sauces" tabindex="-1">
         <img class="module__image lazyload" data-ofi-src="https://www.seriouseats.com/recipes/images/2016/02/20151118-spaghetti-carbonara-vicky-wasik-27.jpg" data-pin-nopin="true" data-src="https://www.seriouseats.com/recipes/images/2016/02/20151118-spaghetti-carbonara-vicky-wasik-27.jpg" src="https://static.seriouseats.com/1/braestar/live/img/placeholder-ratio-4-3.png"/>
         <div class="media-indicator icon-wrapper">
          <div class="icon icon-nav-indicator-video-post-alt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </a>
        <div class="metadata">
         <span class="category-link">
          <span>
           Italian
          </span>
         </span>
         <a class="module__link" data-click-category="promo-triple block-has-featured" data-click-id="featured-slot-1" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/roundups/essential-italian-pasta-sauces">
          <h4 class="title">
           46 Saucy Italian Pasta Dishes You Should Know and Love
          </h4>
          <p class="author">
           The Serious Eats Team
          </p>
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="module">
       <div class="module__wrapper">
        <a class="module__image-container module__link" data-click-category="promo-triple block-has-featured" data-click-id="featured-slot-2" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/2017/01/how-to-make-seafood-stuffed-pasta-shells.html" tabindex="-1">
         <img class="module__image lazyload" data-ofi-src="https://www.seriouseats.com/images/2017/01/20161221-seafood-stuffed-shells-vicky-wasik-8.jpg" data-pin-nopin="true" data-src="https://www.seriouseats.com/images/2017/01/20161221-seafood-stuffed-shells-vicky-wasik-8.jpg" src="https://static.seriouseats.com/1/braestar/live/img/placeholder-ratio-4-3.png"/>
        </a>
        <div class="metadata">
         <a class="module__link" data-click-category="promo-triple block-has-featured" data-click-id="featured-slot-2" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/2017/01/how-to-make-seafood-stuffed-pasta-shells.html">
          <h4 class="title">
           Seafood Finds a New Home in These Stuffed Shells
          </h4>
          <p class="author">
           Daniel Gritzer
          </p>
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="module" data-postid="457574">
       <div class="module__wrapper">
        <a class="module__image-container module__link" data-click-category="promo-triple block-has-featured" data-click-id="featured-slot-3" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/roundups/pasta-pantry-staples" tabindex="-1">
         <img class="module__image lazyload" data-ofi-src="https://www.seriouseats.com/2020/03/20200224-carretteira-pasta-vicky-wasik-21-625x469.jpg" data-pin-nopin="true" data-src="https://www.seriouseats.com/2020/03/20200224-carretteira-pasta-vicky-wasik-21-625x469.jpg" src="https://static.seriouseats.com/1/braestar/live/img/placeholder-ratio-4-3.png"/>
        </a>
        <div class="metadata">
         <a class="category-link" data-click-category="card-category" data-click-id="Pasta" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/recipes/topics/ingredient/pasta">
          <span>
           Pasta
          </span>
         </a>
         <a class="module__link" data-click-category="promo-triple block-has-featured" data-click-id="featured-slot-3" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/roundups/pasta-pantry-staples">
          <h4 class="title">
           Essential Pantry Staples for Better Pasta

             <g fill="currentColor" fill-rule="nonzero" transform="translate(-11.000000, -14.000000)">

      </div>

      </div>

     <li class="c-mega-menu__section" data-click-category="mega-menu" data-click-id="Season" data-title="Season" onclick="toggleMegaMenu(event)">
      <span class="c-mega-menu__section-title">
       Season
      </span>
      <svg class="c-mega-menu__section-chevron c-mega-menu__section-chevron--down" height="10px" viewbox="0 0 18 11" width="17px">
       <g fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd" stroke="none" stroke-width="1">
        <g fill="currentColor" fill-rule="nonzero" transform="translate(-11.000000, -14.000000)">
         <path d="M19.3004955,24.7082389 L11.2897344,16.6414413 C10.9034219,16.252386 10.9034219,15.6216608 11.2897344,15.232646 L12.2240575,14.2917871 C12.6097662,13.9033804 13.2348622,13.9026507 13.6214564,14.2901252 L20.0000201,20.6831903 L26.3785436,14.2901252 C26.7651378,13.9026507 27.3902338,13.9033804 27.7759425,14.2917871 L28.7102656,15.232646 C29.0965781,15.6217013 29.0965781,16.2524265 28.7102656,16.6414413 L20.6995448,24.7082389 C20.3131921,25.0972537 19.6868482,25.0972537 19.3004955,24.7082389 Z" id="c" transform="translate(20.000000, 19.500000) scale(1, -1) translate(-20.000000, -19.500000) ">
         </path>
        </g>
       </g>
      </svg>
      <div class="c-mega-menu__menu u-box-shadow" onclick="propagationStopper(event)">
       <div class="c-mega-menu__child">

       <div class="c-mega-menu__child">

        <div class="c-close-x-container" style="width: 1em; height: 1em;">
         <svg style="pointer-events: none;" viewbox="0 0 32 32">
          <g fill="currentColor" fill-rule="evenodd">
           <rect height="4" rx="2" transform="rotate(45 16 16)" width="32" y="14">
           </rect>
           <rect height="4" rx="2" transform="scale(-1 1) rotate(45 0 -22.627)" width="32" y="14">
           </rect>
          </g>
         </svg>
        </div>

   <script>
    function revealMoreMegaMenuGrandChildren(e) {
    var clickedSection = e.target.closest('.c-mega-menu__child')
    clickedSection.querySelectorAll('.u-hidden.c-mega-menu__grandchild')
      .forEach(function(el) { el.classList.remove('u-hidden') });

    clickedSection.querySelector('.c-mega-menu__grandchild--more')
      .classList.add('u-hidden');
  }

  function closeAllDesktopMegaMenus(e) {
    var allOpenButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.c-mega-menu__section--open');
    var allOpenMenus = document.querySelectorAll('.c-mega-menu__menu--open');
    var outerMenuContainers = document.querySelectorAll('.c-mega-menu');

    allOpenMenus.forEach(function(menu) {
      menu.classList.remove('c-mega-menu__menu--open');
    })

    allOpenButtons.forEach(function(button) {
      button.classList.remove('c-mega-menu__section--open');
    })

    outerMenuContainers.forEach(function(container) {
      container.classList.remove('u-box-shadow');
    })
    window.removeEventListener('click', closeAllDesktopMegaMenus);
  }

  function toggleMegaMenu(e) {
    e.stopPropagation()
    const columnMap = {}
    var clickedButton = e.target.closest('.c-mega-menu__section');
    var clickedMenu = clickedButton.querySelector('.c-mega-menu__menu');
    clickedButton.classList.toggle('c-mega-menu__section--open');
    if (clickedMenu.classList.contains('c-mega-menu__menu--open')) {
      clickedMenu.classList.remove('c-mega-menu__menu--open');
      window.removeEventListener('click', closeAllDesktopMegaMenus);
    } else {
      clickedMenu.classList.add('c-mega-menu__menu--open');
      window.addEventListener('click', closeAllDesktopMegaMenus);
    }

    var outerMenuContainer = clickedButton.closest('.c-mega-menu')
    if (clickedMenu.classList.contains('c-mega-menu__menu--open')) {
      outerMenuContainer.classList.add('u-box-shadow')
    } else {
      outerMenuContainer.classList.remove('u-box-shadow')
    }

    var allOpenButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.c-mega-menu__section--open');
    var allOpenMenus = document.querySelectorAll('.c-mega-menu__menu--open');

    allOpenMenus.forEach(function(menu) {
      if (menu != clickedMenu) menu.classList.remove('c-mega-menu__menu--open');
    })

    allOpenButtons.forEach(function(button) {
      if (button != clickedButton) button.classList.remove('c-mega-menu__section--open');
    })

    if (clickedMenu.getAttribute('data-reflowed')) return;

    var children = clickedMenu.querySelectorAll('.c-mega-menu__child');
    for (const child of children) {
      const left = parseInt(child.offsetLeft).toString()
      if (left in columnMap) {
        columnMap[left].push(child)
      } else {
        columnMap[left] = [child]
      }
    }

    let idx = 0;
    for (const bucket in columnMap) {
      for (const el of columnMap[bucket]) {
        el.classList.add(`${clickedButton.getAttribute('data-title').replace(' ', '-')}-col-${idx}`)
      }
      $(`.${clickedButton.getAttribute('data-title').replace(' ', '-')}-col-${idx}`).wrapAll('<div class="c-mega-menu__column"></div>')
      idx++;
    }
    clickedMenu.classList.add('c-mega-menu__menu--reflowed');
    clickedMenu.style.columns = null;
    clickedMenu.setAttribute('data-reflowed', 1)
  }

  function toggleMegaMenuGrandchild(e) {
    e.stopPropagation();
    var grandChild = e.target.closest('.c-mega-menu__grandchild')

    grandChild.querySelector('.c-mega-menu__great-grandchild').classList.toggle('u-hidden');

    var chevron = grandChild.querySelector('.c-mega-menu__section-chevron')

    chevron.classList.toggle('c-mega-menu__section-chevron-down');
    chevron.classList.toggle('c-mega-menu__section-chevron--up');
  }

  function propagationStopper(e) {
    e.stopPropagation();
  }

  function openFirstMobileMegaMenuSection(e) {
    e.stopPropagation();
    //get the first screenover
    var screenOverEl = e.target
      .querySelector('.c-mega-menu--mobile__screenover')
    screenOverEl
      .classList.remove('c-mega-menu--mobile__screenover--hidden')
    lockBodyScroll(screenOverEl);
  }

  function lockBodyScroll(screenOverEl) {
    unlockBodyScroll();
    var scrollContainerEl = screenOverEl.querySelector(".c-mega-menu--mobile__screenover-scroll-container");
    window.bodyScrollLockScrollingContainer = scrollContainerEl;
    bodyScrollLock.disableBodyScroll(scrollContainerEl);
  }

  function unlockBodyScroll() {
    if (window.bodyScrollLockScrollingContainer) {
      bodyScrollLock.enableBodyScroll(bodyScrollLockScrollingContainer);
      window.bodyScrollLockScrollingContainer = null;
    }
  }

  function openMobileMegaMenuSection(e) {
    e.stopPropagation();
    //get the first screenover
    var screenOverEl = e.target.parentElement
      .querySelector('.c-mega-menu--mobile__screenover')
    screenOverEl
      .classList.remove('c-mega-menu--mobile__screenover--hidden')
    lockBodyScroll(screenOverEl);
  }
  function closeMobileMegaMenuSection(e) {
    e.stopPropagation();
    e.target.closest('.c-mega-menu--mobile__screenover')
      .classList.add('c-mega-menu--mobile__screenover--hidden')
  }
  function openMobileMegaMenu(e) {
    e.stopPropagation();
    var wrapperEl = e.target.closest('.c-mega-menu--mobile__wrapper');
    wrapperEl.querySelector('.c-mega-menu--mobile__overlay')
      .classList.remove('c-mega-menu--mobile__overlay--hidden')
    openFirstMobileMegaMenuSection(e);
  }
  function closeMobileMegaMenu(e) {
    e.stopPropagation();
    var overlayEls = document.querySelectorAll('.c-mega-menu--mobile__overlay')
    overlayEls && overlayEls
    .forEach(function(overlayEl) {
      overlayEl.classList.add('c-mega-menu--mobile__overlay--hidden')
    })
    var screenoverEls = document
      .querySelectorAll('.c-mega-menu--mobile__screenover')
    screenoverEls.forEach(function(el) {
      el.classList.add('c-mega-menu--mobile__screenover--hidden')
    })
    unlockBodyScroll()
  }
  function submitForm(e) {
    var formEl = e.target.closest('form');
    if (formEl.querySelector('input').value.trim().length) {
      formEl.submit()
    }
  }
   </script>
   <div class="o-legacy-page-wrapper c-mega-menu--mobile__wrapper">
    <h5 class="c-mega-menu--mobile__label">
     Browse recipes by category
    </h5>

       <span style="pointer-events: none;">
        Dish Type
       </span>
       <span class="c-mega-menu--mobile__plus-icon" style="pointer-events: none;">
        +
       </span>

        <div class="c-mega-menu--mobile__header">
         <span class="c-mega-menu--mobile__header-left" data-click-category="mega-menu-mobile" data-click-id="Dish Type__back" onclick="closeMobileMegaMenu(event)">
          <svg class="c-mega-menu__section-chevron c-mega-menu__section-chevron--left c-mega-menu--mobile__header-chevron" height="0.75em" viewbox="0 0 18 11" width="0.75em">
           <g fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd" stroke="none" stroke-width="1">
            <g fill="currentColor" fill-rule="nonzero" transform="translate(-11.000000, -14.000000)">
             <path d="M19.3004955,24.7082389 L11.2897344,16.6414413 C10.9034219,16.252386 10.9034219,15.6216608 11.2897344,15.232646 L12.2240575,14.2917871 C12.6097662,13.9033804 13.2348622,13.9026507 13.6214564,14.2901252 L20.0000201,20.6831903 L26.3785436,14.2901252 C26.7651378,13.9026507 27.3902338,13.9033804 27.7759425,14.2917871 L28.7102656,15.232646 C29.0965781,15.6217013 29.0965781,16.2524265 28.7102656,16.6414413 L20.6995448,24.7082389 C20.3131921,25.0972537 19.6868482,25.0972537 19.3004955,24.7082389 Z" id="c" transform="translate(20.000000, 19.500000) scale(1, -1) translate(-20.000000, -19.500000) ">
             </path>
            </g>
           </g>
          </svg>
          <h4 class="c-mega-menu--mobile__header-title">
           Back to all recipes
          </h4>
         </span>
         <span class="c-mega-menu--mobile__header-right" data-click-category="mega-menu-mobile" data-click-id="close-menu-x" onclick="closeMobileMegaMenu(event)">
          <div class="c-close-x-container" style="width: 1em; height: 1em;">
           <svg style="pointer-events: none;" viewbox="0 0 32 32">
            <g fill="currentColor" fill-rule="evenodd">
             <rect height="4" rx="2" transform="rotate(45 16 16)" width="32" y="14">
             </rect>
             <rect height="4" rx="2" transform="scale(-1 1) rotate(45 0 -22.627)" width="32" y="14">
             </rect>
            </g>
           </svg>
          </div>
         </span>
        </div>
        <div class="c-mega-menu--mobile__screenover-scroll-container">
         <h3 class="c-mega-menu--mobile__listing-title">
          Recipes by Dish Type
         </h3>

           <svg class="c-mega-menu__section-chevron c-mega-menu__section-chevron--right" height="0.5em" viewbox="0 0 18 11" width="0.5em">

             <g fill="currentColor" fill-rule="nonzero" transform="translate(-11.000000, -14.000000)">
              <path d="M19.3004955,24.7082389 L11.2897344,16.6414413 C10.9034219,16.252386 10.9034219,15.6216608 11.2897344,15.232646 L12.2240575,14.2917871 C12.6097662,13.9033804 13.2348622,13.9026507 13.6214564,14.2901252 L20.0000201,20.6831903 L26.3785436,14.2901252 C26.7651378,13.9026507 27.3902338,13.9033804 27.7759425,14.2917871 L28.7102656,15.232646 C29.0965781,15.6217013 29.0965781,16.2524265 28.7102656,16.6414413 L20.6995448,24.7082389 C20.3131921,25.0972537 19.6868482,25.0972537 19.3004955,24.7082389 Z" id="c" transform="translate(20.000000, 19.500000) scale(1, -1) translate(-20.000000, -19.500000) ">

   <section class="block block-primary block-no-nav">

     <article class="c-card c-card--small" data-id="457301">

          </path>
         </g>
        </svg>
       </div>
      </a>

       </a>

      </a>
      <div class="c-card__text-container">
       <a class="c-card__category" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/recipes/topics/cuisine/american">
        American
       </a>
       <h4 class="c-card__title">
        <a class="o-link-wrapper" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/2011/03/how-to-make-corned-beef-st-patricks-day-simmering-brisket-meat-the-food-lab.html">
         The Food Lab's Guide to Corned Beef and the Science of Simmering
        </a>
       </h4>
       <p class="c-card__kicker">
        <a class="o-link-wrapper" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/2011/03/how-to-make-corned-beef-st-patricks-day-simmering-brisket-meat-the-food-lab.html">
         The best corned beef is cured at home.
        </a>
       </p>
       <address class="c-card__author">
        <a class="o-link-wrapper" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/2011/03/how-to-make-corned-beef-st-patricks-day-simmering-brisket-meat-the-food-lab.html">
         J. Kenji López-Alt
        </a>
       </address>
      </div>
     </article>
     <article class="c-card c-card--small" data-id="273094">
      <a class="c-card__image-container" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/2014/11/the-truth-about-cast-iron.html">
       <img class="c-card__image lazyload" data-src="https://www.seriouseats.com/images/2014/11/20141106-cast-iron-myth-1-625x469.jpg" src="https://static.seriouseats.com/1/braestar/live/img/placeholder-ratio-4-3.png"/>
       <div class="c-card__video-indicator">
        <svg viewbox="0 0 88 88" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
         <g fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd" transform="translate(1 1)">
          <circle cx="43" cy="43" fill="#000" fill-opacity=".208" r="43" stroke="#FFF" stroke-width="2">
          </circle>
          <path d="M60.015 43.51l-28.8 16.005c-.333.188-.619.21-.857.065-.239-.145-.358-.405-.358-.781V26.875c0-.376.12-.636.358-.78.238-.145.524-.124.856.064l28.801 16.006c.333.188.5.412.5.672 0 .26-.167.484-.5.672z" fill="#FFF">
          </path>
         </g>
        </svg>
       </div>
      </a>
      <div class="c-card__text-container">
       <a class="c-card__category" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/how-tos/equipment">
        Equipment
       </a>
       <h4 class="c-card__title">
        <a class="o-link-wrapper" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/2014/11/the-truth-about-cast-iron.html">
         The Truth About Cast Iron Pans: 7 Myths That Need To Go Away
        </a>
       </h4>
       <p class="c-card__kicker">
        <a class="o-link-wrapper" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/2014/11/the-truth-about-cast-iron.html">
         The world of cast iron is packed with myths. Join @thefoodlab as he puts them to rest.
        </a>
       </p>
       <address class="c-card__author">

        </a>
       </address>
      </div>
     </article>
    </section>

     <div class="module" data-postid="457574">

       <a class="module__image-container module__link" data-click-category="promo-single" data-click-id="cocktails" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/recipes/topics/meal/drinks/cocktails" tabindex="-1">

       </a>
       <div class="metadata">

         </h3>
         <div class="nav-share nav-share-wide">
          <a aria-hidden="true" class="social-facebook icon-wrapper" data-event="facebook" data-location="video-endcard" target="_blank" title="Share on Facebook">

      <div class="player-metadata">
       <h2 class="title">
        The Perfect Pan for Saucing Pasta
       </h2>
       <p class="description">
        The perfect pan for finishing a pasta in its sauce. [Technique: Daniel Gritzer. Video: Serious Eats Video.]
        <a class="article-link" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/2020/07/best-pasta-pan.html">
         Read the Full Article
        </a>
       </p>
       <div class="nav-share nav-share-wide">
        <a aria-hidden="true" class="social-facebook icon-wrapper" data-event="facebook" data-location="video-top-player" rel="noopener" target="_blank" title="Share on Facebook">
         <span class="icon icon-social-facebook">
         </span>
        </a>
        <a aria-hidden="true" class="social-twitter icon-wrapper" data-event="twitter" data-location="video-top-player" rel="noopener" target="_blank" title="Share on Twitter">

      <a class="c-card__image-container" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/roundups/best-pasta-bowls">
       <img class="c-card__image lazyload" data-src="https://www.seriouseats.com/2020/02/20200114-nduja-pasta16-625x469.jpg" src="https://static.seriouseats.com/1/braestar/live/img/placeholder-ratio-4-3.png"/>
       <div class="c-card__video-indicator" style="display: none;">

          </path>
         </g>
        </svg>
       </div>
      </a>
      <div class="c-card__text-container">
       <a class="c-card__category" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/products/editors-picks">
        Editors' Picks
       </a>
       <h4 class="c-card__title">
        <a class="o-link-wrapper" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/roundups/best-pasta-bowls">
         Our Favorite Pasta Bowls
        </a>
       </h4>
       <p class="c-card__kicker">
        <a class="o-link-wrapper" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/roundups/best-pasta-bowls">
         The ones we reach for at home and in the Serious Eats kitchen.
        </a>
       </p>
       <address class="c-card__author">
        <a class="o-link-wrapper" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/roundups/best-pasta-bowls">
         Ariel Kanter
        </a>
       </address>
      </div>
     </article>
     <article class="c-card c-card--small" data-id="457683">
      <a class="c-card__image-container" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/2021/03/cooking-chopsticks-best-tool.html">
       <img class="c-card__image lazyload" data-src="https://www.seriouseats.com/2021/02/20210225-cooking-chopsticks-vicky-wasik-625x469.jpg" src="https://static.seriouseats.com/1/braestar/live/img/placeholder-ratio-4-3.png"/>
       <div class="c-card__video-indicator" style="display: none;">
        <svg viewbox="0 0 88 88" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
         <g fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd" transform="translate(1 1)">
          <circle cx="43" cy="43" fill="#000" fill-opacity=".208" r="43" stroke="#FFF" stroke-width="2">
          </circle>
          <path d="M60.015 43.51l-28.8 16.005c-.333.188-.619.21-.857.065-.239-.145-.358-.405-.358-.781V26.875c0-.376.12-.636.358-.78.238-.145.524-.124.856.064l28.801 16.006c.333.188.5.412.5.672 0 .26-.167.484-.5.672z" fill="#FFF">
          </path>
         </g>
        </svg>
       </div>
      </a>
      <div class="c-card__text-container">

   <section class="block block-module-sides podcast-block self-clear">
    <header class="block__header">
     <h4 class="block__title">
      Special Sauce Podcast
     </h4>
    </header>
    <div class="podcast-info">
     <span class="userpic">
      <span style="background-image: url('https://static.seriouseats.com/1/braestar/live/pages/editors/ed-levine-400.jpg');" title="Ed Levine">
      </span>
     </span>
     <p>
      Welcome to Special Sauce, a James Beard–nominated podcast hosted by Serious Eats founder Ed Levine. Join us each week for intimate conversations about food and life between Ed and well-known food lovers like Calvin Trillin, Ruth Reichl, and Chris Kimball.
     </p>
     <div>
      <a href="https://soundcloud.com/user-306003081" rel="noopener" style="margin-right: 0.75em;" target="_blank">
       <img alt="Special Sauce with Ed Levine on Soundcloud" src="https://static.seriouseats.com/1/braestar/live/img/soundcloud-follow.png"/>
      </a>
      <a href="https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/special-sauce-with-ed-levine/id1054509922" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
       <img alt="Special Sauce with Ed Levine on iTunes" src="https://static.seriouseats.com/1/braestar/live/img/itunes.png"/>
      </a>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="podcast-embed">
     <iframe frameborder="no" height="150" scrolling="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/users/183567860&amp;color=ff5500&amp;auto_play=false&amp;hide_related=false&amp;show_comments=false&amp;show_user=false&amp;show_reposts=false" width="100%">
     </iframe>
    </div>
    <footer class="block__footer" style="margin:0;padding-top:1em;clear:both;">
     <div class="more">
      <a class="btn" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/culture/podcast">
       More Special Sauce Episodes
      </a>
     </div>
    </footer>
   </section>

          <path d="M60.015 43.51l-28.8 16.005c-.333.188-.619.21-.857.065-.239-.145-.358-.405-.358-.781V26.875c0-.376.12-.636.358-.78.238-.145.524-.124.856.064l28.801 16.006c.333.188.5.412.5.672 0 .26-.167.484-.5.672z" fill="#FFF">
          </path>
         </g>
        </svg>
       </div>
      </a>

          </path>
         </g>
        </svg>
       </div>
      </a>
      <div class="c-card__text-container">
       <a class="c-card__category" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/recipes/topics/meal/breakfast-and-brunch">
        Breakfast and Brunch
       </a>
       <h4 class="c-card__title">
        <a class="o-link-wrapper" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/2014/05/the-secrets-to-peeling-hard-boiled-eggs.html">

        </a>
       </h4>
       <p class="c-card__kicker">
        <a class="o-link-wrapper" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/2014/05/the-secrets-to-peeling-hard-boiled-eggs.html">
         How to make perfectly boiled eggs with clean-peeling shells.
        </a>
       </p>
       <address class="c-card__author">
        <a class="o-link-wrapper" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/2014/05/the-secrets-to-peeling-hard-boiled-eggs.html">
         J. Kenji López-Alt
        </a>
       </address>
      </div>
     </article>
     <article class="c-card c-card--small" data-id="210418">
      <a class="c-card__image-container" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/2013/10/sous-vide-101-all-about-eggs.html">
       <img class="c-card__image lazyload" data-src="https://www.seriouseats.com/images/2013/10/20131004-sous-vide-101-egg-chorizo-corn-crouton-temperature-primary.jpg" src="https://static.seriouseats.com/1/braestar/live/img/placeholder-ratio-4-3.png"/>
       <div class="c-card__video-indicator" style="display: none;">
        <svg viewbox="0 0 88 88" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
         <g fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd" transform="translate(1 1)">
          <circle cx="43" cy="43" fill="#000" fill-opacity=".208" r="43" stroke="#FFF" stroke-width="2">
          </circle>
          <path d="M60.015 43.51l-28.8 16.005c-.333.188-.619.21-.857.065-.239-.145-.358-.405-.358-.781V26.875c0-.376.12-.636.358-.78.238-.145.524-.124.856.064l28.801 16.006c.333.188.5.412.5.672 0 .26-.167.484-.5.672z" fill="#FFF">
          </path>
         </g>
        </svg>
       </div>
      </a>
      <div class="c-card__text-container">
       <a class="c-card__category" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/recipes/topics/meal/breakfast-and-brunch">
        Breakfast and Brunch
       </a>
       <h4 class="c-card__title">
        <a class="o-link-wrapper" href="https://www.seriouseats.com/2013/10/sous-vide-101-all-about-eggs.html">

     </article>

},{key:"getCookie",value:function getCookie(cname){var name=cname+"=";var decodedCookie=decodeURIComponent(document.cookie);var ca=decodedCookie.split(";");for(var i=0;i<ca.length;i++){var c=ca[i];while(c.charAt(0)==" "){c=c.substring(1)}if(c.indexOf(name)==0){return c.substring(name.length,c.length)}}return""}// getCookie
},{key:"setCookie",value:function setCookie(cname,cvalue,cdomain,exdays){var d=new Date;d.setTime(d.getTime()+exdays*24*60*60*1000);var expires="expires="+d.toUTCString();var domain="domain="+cdomain;document.cookie=cname+"="+cvalue+";"+domain+";"+expires+";path=/"}// setCookie
},{key:"checkLoginCookie",value:function checkLoginCookie(success,failure){var logged_in=this.getCookie("cameo_logged_in");var username=this.getCookie("cameo_username");if(logged_in&&username&&success){success(username)}else if(failure){failure()}}// checkLoginCookie
// COMMENTS
},{key:"getComments",value:function getComments(post_id,callback){if(!post_id)return;var parent_object=this;var current_date=new Date;var cache_bust=""+current_date.getUTCFullYear()+(current_date.getUTCMonth()+1)+current_date.getUTCDate()+current_date.getUTCHours()+current_date.getUTCMinutes();var request_url=parent_object.topics_url+"?record=wpcomments-"+post_id+"&cache_bust="+cache_bust;$.ajax({context:parent_object,url:request_url,dataType:"jsonp",jsonp:"jsonp",success:function success(data,textStatus,jqXHR){$.each(data["entries"],function(key,value){parent_object.comments[value["post_id"]]=value["comments"];callback(post_id,value["comments"])})}})}// getComments
},{key:"newComment",value:function newComment(post_id,comment_text,callback_success,callback_failure){var comment_rating=arguments.length>4&&arguments[4]!==undefined?arguments[4]:undefined;if(!(post_id||comment_text))return;var thisCL=this;thisCL.getNonce("create_ajax_new_comment_nonce",function(nonce){var data={};data["action"]="ajax_new_comment";data["_ajax_nonce"]=nonce;data["post_id"]=post_id;data["comment_text"]=comment_text;if(comment_rating!==undefined)data["comment_rating"]=comment_rating;$.ajax({url:thisCL.ajax_url,type:"POST",data:data,crossDomain:true,_ajax_nonce:nonce,xhrFields:{withCredentials:true}}).done(function(response){callback_success(post_id,response["data"])}).fail(function(a,b,c){callback_failure(post_id,response["data"])})});return}// newComment
// NONCE
},{key:"getNonce",value:function getNonce(action,callback){if(!action)return;var thisCL=this;var data={};data["action"]=action;$.post(thisCL.ajax_url,{"action":action,"data":data},function(response){if(response["success"]==true){callback(response["data"])}else{thisCL.error()}}).fail(function(a,b,c){})}// getNonce
},{key:"login",value:function login(username,password,callback_success,callback_failure){if(!(username&&password))return;var parent_object=this;parent_object.getNonce("create_ajax_login_nonce",function(nonce){var data={};data["action"]="ajax_login";data["_ajax_nonce"]=nonce;data["username"]=username;data["password"]=password;$.ajax({url:parent_object.ajax_url,type:"POST",data:data,crossDomain:true,username:username,password:password,_ajax_nonce:nonce,xhrFields:{withCredentials:true}}).success(function(response){if(response["success"]==true){parent_object.setCookie("cameo_username",username,parent_object.cookie_domain,14.5);parent_object.setCookie("cameo_logged_in",true,parent_object.cookie_domain,14.5);callback_success(response["data"]);document.dispatchEvent(parent_object.login_success_event)}else{parent_object.deleteCookie("cameo_username");parent_object.deleteCookie("cameo_logged_in");callback_failure(response["data"]);document.dispatchEvent(parent_object.login_failure_event)}}).fail(function(a,b,c){parent_object.deleteCookie("cameo_username");parent_object.deleteCookie("cameo_logged_in");callback_failure(response["data"]);document.dispatchEvent(parent_object.login_failure_event)})})}// login
},{key:"logout",value:function logout(callback){var parent_object=this;parent_object.getNonce("create_ajax_logout_nonce",function(nonce){$.post(parent_object.ajax_url,{"action":"ajax_logout","_ajax_nonce":nonce},function(response){parent_object.deleteCookie("cameo_logged_in");parent_object.deleteCookie("cameo_username");callback(response["data"]);document.dispatchEvent(parent_object.logout_success_event)}).fail(function(a,b,c){})})}// logout
},{key:"forgotPassword",value:function forgotPassword(userlogin,callback_success,callback_failure){if(!userlogin)return;var parent_object=this;parent_object.getNonce("create_ajax_forgot_password_nonce",function(nonce){$.post(parent_object.ajax_url,{"action":"ajax_forgot_password","_ajax_nonce":nonce,"user_login":userlogin},function(response){if(response["success"]==true){if(callback_success)callback_success(response["data"])}else{if(callback_failure)callback_failure(response["data"])}}).fail(function(a,b,c){})})}// forgotPassword
},{key:"register",value:function register(login,email,captcha_token,callback_success,callback_failure){if(!(login||email))return;var parent_object=this;parent_object.getNonce("create_ajax_register_nonce",function(nonce){$.post(parent_object.ajax_url,{"action":"ajax_register","_ajax_nonce":nonce,"login":login,"email":email,"captcha":captcha_token},function(response){if(response["success"]==true){if(callback_success)callback_success(response["data"])}else{if(callback_failure)callback_failure(response["data"])}}).fail(function(a,b,c){})})}// register
},{key:"resetPassword",value:function resetPassword(login,key,pass1,pass2,callback_success,callback_failure){if(!(pass1||pass2))return;var parent_object=this;parent_object.getNonce("create_ajax_reset_password_nonce",function(nonce){$.post(parent_object.ajax_url,{"action":"ajax_reset_password","_ajax_nonce":nonce,"login":login,"key":key,"pass1":pass1,"pass2":pass2},function(response){if(response["success"]==true){if(callback_success)callback_success(response["data"])}else{if(callback_failure)callback_failure(response["data"])}}).fail(function(a,b,c){})})}// resetPassword
}]);return cameo}();// CameoLogin
window._cameo=new cameo;var _modal_visible=false;// var $loginForm = $('login-modal__form');
$("#login-modal__bg, #login-modal__close").click(function(){$("#login-modal__outer-wrap").hide();document.getElementById("login-modal__pw").value="";$("#login-modal__status").attr("class","").html("&nbsp;");seGlobalMethods.unfreezeWindow();_modal_visible=false});$(document).keydown(function(e){if(_modal_visible&&e.keyCode==27){$("#login-modal__close").click()}});// Use this method for dynamically created links (finite scroll)
$(document).on("click",".login-link",function(e){e.preventDefault();$("#login-modal__outer-wrap").show();document.getElementById("login-modal__un").focus();seGlobalMethods.freezeWindow();_modal_visible=true});$("#login-modal__submit").click(function(e){e.preventDefault();var uField=document.getElementById("login-modal__un"),pField=document.getElementById("login-modal__pw"),username=uField.value,password=pField.value;if(!(username&&password)){$("#login-modal__status").attr("class","error").html("Missing username or password.");return}_cameo.login(username,password,modal_login_success,modal_login_failure);$("#login-modal__status").attr("class","working").text("Working")});function modal_login_success(response){document.getElementById("login-modal__un").value="";document.getElementById("login-modal__pw").value="";$("#login-modal__status").attr("class","success").html("Success &nbsp;&#x2714;");setTimeout(function(){$("#login-modal__outer-wrap").hide();seGlobalMethods.unfreezeWindow();$("#login-modal__status").attr("class","").html("&nbsp;")},1000)}// modal_login_success
function modal_login_failure(response){var message=response["message"];$("#login-modal__status").attr("class","error").text(message)}// modal_login_failure
  </script>
  <div data-offset-top="200" data-spy="affix" id="button-to-top">
   <a>
    <i class="icon-arrow-up">
    </i>
   </a>
  </div>
  <script src="https://static.seriouseats.com/1/braestar/live/js/libs/libs.footer.min.js?v=3" type="text/javascript">
  </script>
  <script src="https://static.seriouseats.com/1/braestar/live/js/libs/ofi.min.js" type="text/javascript">
  </script>
  <script src="https://static.seriouseats.com/1/braestar/live/js/ads.js?v=11" type="text/javascript">
  </script>
  <script>
   window.seGlobalMethods = window.seGlobalMethods || {};
  seGlobalMethods.observeIntersection = (element, callback) => {
    const thresholdArray = steps => Array(steps + 1)
     .fill(0)
     .map((_, index) => index / steps || 0)

    const handleIntersect = entries => {
      entries.forEach(entry => {
        callback(entry);
      });
    }

    const observer = new IntersectionObserver(handleIntersect, {
      threshold: thresholdArray(20),
    });
    observer.observe(element);
  }
  </script>
  <script src="https://static.seriouseats.com/1/braestar/live/js/global.min.js?v=20200917a" type="text/javascript">
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   (function(){window.seGlobalState=window.seGlobalState||{};window.seGlobalState.staging=false;})();
  </script>
  <script>
   (function(){

function adsWrapper(r,s){var e,a,y=window.seGlobalMethods&&window.seGlobalMethods.isDebug&&window.seGlobalMethods.isDebug("ad-logging"),o=window.seGlobalMethods&&window.seGlobalMethods.isDebug&&window.seGlobalMethods.isDebug("ad-display"),t=window.seGlobalMethods&&window.seGlobalMethods.isDebug&&window.seGlobalMethods.isDebug("short-refresh");window._seAds=window._seAds||{},window.googletag=googletag||{},googletag.cmd=googletag.cmd||[],_seAds.slots=[],_seAds.positionVideoEl=function(){try{var t=_seAds.refresh.slots,s=0,a=t.length;s<a;s++)if(e.slot===t[s].googletagSlot){t[s].ive=!0;break}}catch(e){}}),googletag.pubads().addEventListener("slotVisibilityChanged",function(e){if(_seAds.positionVideoEl(),!e.isEmpty)try{for(var event heard"),_seAds.geo.response=!0;for(var t=e.data.geo.split("&"),s=0,a=t.length;s<a;s++){var o=t[s].split("=");if("zp"===decodeURIComponent(o[0]))return void(_seAds.geo.zip=decodeURIComponent(o[1]))}}if("fexy_ad_response"===e.data.id){y&&console.log("%c  ","background-color: blue;","_seAds.listeners > fexy_ad_response event   <script>
   $(document).ready(function(){
      var $mobileStickyAd = $('.mobile-sticky-ad');
      $mobileStickyAd.find('button').on('click', function(){
        // Kills the pop-up completely:
        // $mobileStickyAd.remove();
        // Allows for the refresh to bring the unit back into view:
        $mobileStickyAd.addClass('collapsed');
      });
      var googletagCheckInt = 500,
          googletagCheckTO = 10000;
      (function() {
        window.googletag = googletag || {};
        googletag.cmd = googletag.cmd || [];
        googletag.cmd.push(function() {
          googletag.pubads().addEventListener('slotRenderEnded', function(event) {
            try {
              if (_seAds && _seAds.slots && _seAds.slots.length) {
                var mobileStickyAdSlots = _seAds.slots.filter(function(slot){
                      return slot.id === 'mobile-sticky-ad__ad';
                    }).map(function(slot){
                      return slot.googletagSlot;
                    });
                if (mobileStickyAdSlots.length && mobileStickyAdSlots[0] === event.slot) {
                  if(!event.isEmpty) {
                    $mobileStickyAd.removeClass('collapsed');
                  } else {
                    $mobileStickyAd.addClass('collapsed');
                  }
                }
              }
            } catch(e) {
              $mobileStickyAd.addClass('collapsed');
            }
          });
        });
      })();
    });
  </script>
  <div class="ad-wrapper" style="margin:0;height:1px;min-height:0;text-align:left;overflow:hidden;">
   <div class="ad-breakout SE_Interstitial-breakout">
   </div>
   <div class="auto-ad" data-ad-oop="true" data-ad-size="[[1,1]]" data-ad-unit="SE_Interstitial" id="footer-interstitial">
   </div>
  </div>
  <script>
   try {
  setTimeout(function() {
    dataLayer.push({
      "event" : "gaEvent",
      "category" : "dwell",
      "action" : "1 minute elapsed",
      "label" : "",
      "nonInteraction": false
    })
  }, 60000);  
} catch (e) {}
  </script>
  <script>
   $("div.social-links li a").click(function()
  {
    try {
      var event_name = $(this).data("event");
      var location = $(this).data("location");
      dataLayer.push({
        "event": "gaEvent",
        "category": "share", 
        "action": event_name,
        "label": location,
        "nonInteraction": false
      });
    } catch (err) {}
  });

  var _ads_tracker_created = false;

  function create_ads_tracker()
  {
    if (_ads_tracker_created == true)
      return;

    try {
      ga('create', 'UA-962456-13', 'auto', { name: 'ads' } );
      _ads_tracker_created = true;
    } catch(err) {}
  }

  function adsTracking(num, type, campaign, action, dimension, value) {
    if (!_ads_tracker_created)
      create_ads_tracker();

    try {
      ga(num, type, campaign, action, dimension, value);
      ga('ads.send', 'pageview');
    } catch (e) { }
  };
  </script>
  <script async="" data-pin-build="parsePinBtns" defer="" src="//assets.pinterest.com/js/pinit.js" type="text/javascript">
  </script>

  <script>
   // Configure the adblock detector
  (function(){
    if (typeof window.adblockDetector === 'undefined') {
      adBlockDetected();
    } else {
      window.adblockDetector.init(
        {
          debug: true,
          found: function(){
            dataLayer.push({
              "event": "gaEvent",
              "category": "adblock", 
              "action": "true",
              "label": "",
              "nonInteraction": "true"
            });
          },
          notFound: function(){
            dataLayer.push({
              "event": "gaEvent",
              "category": "adblock", 
              "action": "false",
              "label": "",
              "nonInteraction": "true"
            });
          }
        }
      );
    }
  }());
  </script>
  <script async="" src="https://relish.com/scripts/relish.js?key=fad43e07-2ce3-4c04-97a2-ffd099ecbfd9">
  </script>
  <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@tarekraafat/autocomplete.js@7.2.0/dist/js/autoComplete.min.js">
  </script>
  <script>
   const populatePopularSearches = (popularCategories) => {
    document.querySelector('.Search-overlay__popular')
    .querySelectorAll('a')
    .forEach(( el, idx ) => {
      el.innerText = popularCategories[idx].name
      el.href = popularCategories[idx].url
      el.setAttribute(
        'data-click-id',
        'click-popular-' + popularCategories[idx].name
      )
    })
  }

  try {

  new autoComplete({
    data: {
      src: async () => {
        const topicsUrl = 'https://www.seriouseats.com/topics?index=categories&term=c%7Crecipes%7Ctopics';
        const categories = await $.ajax({
          url: topicsUrl,
          dataType: 'jsonp',
          jsonp: 'jsonp',
        });

        const flattenedCategories = []

        const walk = (items, depth) => {
          for (const child of items) {
            child.depth = depth
            flattenedCategories.push(child)
            walk(child.children, depth + 1);
          }
        }

        walk(categories.entries[0].children, 0)

        const terms = flattenedCategories.sort((a,b) => parseFloat(b.popularity_score) - parseFloat(a.popularity_score))

        populatePopularSearches(terms.filter(t => t.depth > 0))

        return terms.map(t => t.name)
      },
      cache: true
     },
      placeHolder: "What would you like to cook?",
      selector: "#search-box",
      threshold: 2,
      debounce: 100,
      searchEngine: "strict",
      resultsList: {
        render: true,
          destination: document.getElementById('search-result-box'),
          position: "beforeend",
          element: "ul"
       },
      maxResults: 5,
      highlight: true,
      resultItem: {
        content: (data, source) => {
          source.innerHTML = data.match;
        },
        element: "li"
      },
      onSelection: feedback => {
        feedback.event.stopPropagation();
        feedback.event.preventDefault();
        dataLayer.push({
          "event": "gaEvent",
          "category": 'search-overlay',
          "action": 'search',
          "label": 'autocomplete-selection-' + feedback.selection.value,
          "nonInteraction": false
        });
        window.location = `${window.location.origin}/search?term=${feedback.selection.value}`
      }
    });
  } catch(e) {
    console.error('could not load autocomplete')
  }
  </script>
  <script async="" src="https://static.seriouseats.com/1/braestar/live/js/shopify.js?v=14" type="text/javascript">
  </script>
  <script src="//z-na.amazon-adsystem.com/widgets/onejs?MarketPlace=US&amp;adInstanceId=595cac75-d7eb-416f-8d8d-d06ee68d679e">
  </script>

   var PUBLISHER_NAME="Serious Eats, Inc.",POPUP_DELAY=5e3,__cmp="function"==typeof __cmp?__cmp:function(e){var t=arguments;return t.length?"__cmp"!=e&&(void 0===__cmp.a&&(__cmp.a=[]),void __cmp.a.push([].slice.apply(t))):__cmp.a},elem=document.createElement("script");elem.src="//quantcast.mgr.consensu.org/v28/cmp.js",elem.async=!0,elem.type="text/javascript";var scpt=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];scpt.parentNode.insertBefore(elem,scpt);var display_ui=URL?new URL(document.location).searchParams.get("gdpr_display_ui"):null,ui_layout=URL?new URL(document.location).searchParams.get("gdpr_ui_layout"):"",show_popup=function(){setTimeout(function(){window.__cmp("init",{"Display UI":display_ui||"inEU","UI Layout":ui_layout||"",Language:"EN","Initial Screen Reject Button Text":"I do not accept","Initial Screen Accept Button Text":"I accept","Purpose Screen Header Title Text":"Privacy settings","Purpose Screen Body Text":"You can set your consent preferences and determine how you want your data to be used based on the purposes below. You can click on their privacy policies for more information and to opt out.","Vendor Screen Accept All Button Text":"Accept all","Vendor Screen Reject All Button Text":"Reject all","Initial Screen Body Text":"We and our partners use technology such as cookies on our site to personalise content and ads, provide social media features, and analyse our traffic. Click below to consent to the use of this technology across the web. You can change your mind and change your consent choices at anytime by returning to this site.","Initial Screen Body Text Option":1,"Default Value for Toggles":"off","Consent Scope":"service","Publisher Name":PUBLISHER_NAME,"Publisher Purpose IDs":[3,5],"Consent Scope Group URL":window.location.origin,"Publisher Logo":""})},POPUP_DELAY)};document.addEventListener?document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded",function(){show_popup()},!1):document.attachEvent?document.attachEvent("onreadystatechange",function(){"complete"===document.readyState&&show_popup()}):show_popup();
  </script>

  <style>
   .qc-cmp-ui-container .qc-cmp-ui{color:#30a2cc;background-color:#fff}.qc-cmp-ui .qc-cmp-nav-bar-publisher-logo,.qc-cmp-ui .qc-cmp-publisher-logo{display:none}.qc-cmp-ui .qc-cmp-title{color:#30a2cc}.qc-cmp-ui .qc-cmp-button,.qc-cmp-ui .qc-cmp-button.qc-cmp-secondary-button:hover{background-color:#30a2cc;border-color:#30a2cc;color:#fff}.qc-cmp-ui .qc-cmp-button.qc-cmp-secondary-button,.qc-cmp-ui .qc-cmp-button:hover{border-color:#30a2cc}.qc-cmp-ui .qc-cmp-button:hover{background-color:#3385a4;border-color:#3385a4;color:#fff}.qc-cmp-ui .qc-cmp-alt-action,.qc-cmp-ui .qc-cmp-link{color:#30a2cc;text-decoration:none}.qc-cmp-ui .qc-cmp-alt-action:hover,.qc-cmp-ui .qc-cmp-link:hover{color:#30a2cc;text-decoration:underline;opacity:1}.qc-cmp-ui .qc-cmp-tab:hover{background-color:#30a2cc}.qc-cmp-ui .qc-cmp-toggle{background-color:#a6a9ae;border:1px solid #a6a9ae}.qc-cmp-ui .qc-cmp-small-toggle.qc-cmp-toggle-on,.qc-cmp-ui .qc-cmp-toggle.qc-cmp-toggle-on{background-color:#30a2cc;border-color:#30a2cc}.qc-cmp-ui .qc-cmp-enabled-cell,.qc-cmp-ui .qc-cmp-table,.qc-cmp-ui .qc-cmp-toggle-status{color:#30a2cc}

  <script>
   $(document).ready(function() {
  $("[data-click-id][data-click-category]").on("click", function() {

    var _click_id = $(this).attr("data-click-id");
    var _click_category = $(this).attr("data-click-category");

    if (!_click_id || !_click_category)
      return;

    dataLayer.push({
      "event" : "gaEventBeacon",
      "category" : _click_category,
      "action" : "click",
      "label" : _click_id,
      "nonInteraction": false
    });

  });
});
  </script>
  <script>
   function flipProductTile(e) {
  const flipperEl = e.target
    .closest('.c-shopify-product-tile__flipper')
  if (flipperEl.classList.contains('c-shopify-product-tile__flipper--flipped')) {
    flipperEl.classList.remove('c-shopify-product-tile__flipper--flipped')
    bodyScrollLock.enableBodyScroll(flipperEl);
  } else {
    document.querySelectorAll('.c-shopify-product-tile__flipper--flipped')
      .forEach(el => el.classList.remove('c-shopify-product-tile__flipper--flipped'));

    flipperEl.classList.add('c-shopify-product-tile__flipper--flipped');
    if (window.innerWidth <= 480) {
      $(':not(.header-global--desktop).header-global')
        .addClass('stuck');
      $(this).scrollTop = 0;
      bodyScrollLock.disableBodyScroll(flipperEl);
    }
  }
}

function toggleBlurb() {
  // If target is a link (either whole card or 'buy' button), exit without toggling
  if($(this).is('a')) {return;}
  var parentModule = $(this).parents(".module");
  var productBlurbEl = parentModule.find('.product-blurb')[0];
  if(parentModule.hasClass("has-blurb")) {
    if (parentModule.hasClass("show-blurb")){
      parentModule.removeClass("show-blurb");
      bodyScrollLock.enableBodyScroll(productBlurbEl);
    } else {
      $(".show-blurb").removeClass("show-blurb");
      parentModule.addClass("show-blurb");
      if (window.innerWidth < 480) {
        $(':not(.header-global--desktop).header-global')
          .addClass('stuck');
        $(this).scrollTop = 0;
        bodyScrollLock.disableBodyScroll(productBlurbEl);
      }
    }

    try {
      var productTitle = parentModule.find("h4.title").text().trim();
      dataLayer.push({
        "event": "gaEvent",
        "category": "product", 
        "action": "toggleBlurb",
        "label": productTitle,
        "nonInteraction": false
      });
    } catch (e) {};
  }

} // toggleBlurb

$(".product .card-front, .product .metadata, .product .product-blurb").on("click", function(e){toggleBlurb.call(e.target);});

(function ieCardFix(){
  if(document.all && !window.atob) { // IE9 or below
    $(".card-flip-container").removeClass("css3");
  }
})();
  </script>
 </body>
</html>
